objects.text:
• 3-in-1 Filter System
• Removes Pollutants & Odors
• Quiet Operation (25-44dB)

product_details.description: Note: The adapter is stored inside the air purifier; Power Adapter(Input): 100-240V 50/60 H Rated Power: 7W Noise Level: 25-44dB Dimension: 6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 inch. 𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗩𝗘 𝗣𝗢𝗟𝗟𝗨𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗦 𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: Our Pre-Filter and Main Filter capture lint, hair, pet dander, fine airborne pollutants, and smoke particles, helping achieve a cleaner environment for you 𝗛𝗘𝗟𝗣 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗦 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗟𝗘𝗦𝗦: The Activated Carbon Filter helps neutralize smoke, odors, and fumes. You’ll love the feeling of breathing deeply at home 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗜𝗧 𝗔𝗡𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: With the Levoit Core Mini-P air purifiers for home, focus on your activities in the bedroom, kitchen, or office. It offers an auto-off display for uninterrupted sleep and calming aromatherapy #𝟭 𝗔𝗜𝗥 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗥 𝗕𝗥𝗔𝗡𝗗: Levoit has sold over 6.5 million products worldwide, is available in 35 countries and regions, and has been a pioneer in air purification technology for 6 years 𝗚𝗘𝗡𝗨𝗜𝗡𝗘 𝗟𝗘𝗩𝗢𝗜𝗧 𝗙𝗜𝗟𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗦: Only use genuine Levoit replacement parts to maintain the best performance (Search for Core Mini-RF). Off-brand filters are inconsistent, unreliable, and may damage the air purifier 𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘: Our products are manufactured in both Vietnam and China, so you may receive a machine made in either Vietnam or China Color - White ** Brand - LEVOIT ** Product Dimensions - 6.5"D x 6.5"W x 10.4"H ** Floor Area - 337 Square Feet ** Specification Met - ETL Certified **

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek, modern design emphasizing a high-tech product. On the left side, a rounded rectangular gradient background in soft blue shades serves as a base for textual elements. The banner contains multiple structured text layers: the main title "heading" using a futuristic font in a strong navy tone, a bold secondary title "subheading" just below it, and a tagline "tagline" in smaller type. Three informative bullet points are presented in the "description" layer. Below them, the "price" layer uses large numerals to prominently display cost. A solid rectangular button "cta_button" with overlaying white "cta" text drives user engagement. The right side features the product image "product_image", giving it visual dominance. Circular graphic accents balance the layout and enhance the tech aesthetic.

**Color Palette**:
- Light Sky Blue: `#F5F9FC`
- Soft Cyan: `#EBF6FF`
- Deep Navy: `#0C4A6E`
- Marine Blue: `#0D578F`
- Medium Blue: `#0F609F`
- Bright Blue CTA: `#0C80C5`
- Accent Circles: `#A5D8FF`, `#7CC2FF`, `#BAE3FF`
- White Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek air purifier that utilizes a minimalistic and modern color palette. Dominated by clean white (#FFFFFF) on the body, it conveys purity and freshness, ideal for health-related products. The top grille contrasts in a deep charcoal gray (#4A4A4A), adding depth and highlighting the device’s vent system. Soft grey branding (#B0B0B0) blends subtly into the exterior without distracting from the design. Subtle indicator lights offer a touch of color: soft blue (#5DADE2) and red (#E74C3C), emphasizing functionality and status. This color balance makes white stand out while seamlessly blending cool tones for a fresh, premium look.
